name: Caveman Invasion
description:
Cavemen are coming to invade! Shoot them down with your brand spanking new rock shooter! They can only be knocked over by the same color rock! Shoot ammo crates to get more ammo! Gain points by knocking them over. Lose points by hitting the wrong color caveman!

Controls:

W/S: Aim Up/Down

Mouse: Aim Left/Right

Left Click: Shoot

Rick Click: Change rock color

Made by Spencer Larkin for Ludum Dare 36 in under 72 hours.

Music by Devin Wall: https://soundcloud.com/devinwall

Ludum Dare Entry: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-36/?action=preview&uid=49972
